name: DOIT Software
tagline: Mobile app, UX/UI, DS, AI, ML. Team Augmentation
description:
DOIT Software is a team of thinkers, not just doers :) 
There are many challenges you're facing in the development. It’s not about speed, quality, and communication as these are essentials. The primary challenge is engagement in the process and team approach as far as we see it. The IT team shouldn’t only provide excellent performance, but in addition work together with you to create the best solutions.
 
We helped our partners in USA, Canada, Australia, Norway and Hong Kong to solve many challenges using a proactive and creative approach.
 
Except for IT expertise, we have own experience in startups and new businesses development. We're professional in Mobile applications creation (native iOS, Android, React Native), Web Solutions, Back-End, UX/UI, QA and Data Science Team Augmentation
